And <S%G2532><s%> when he had <S%G1834>declared<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> these things unto <S%G846>them,<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2445>Joppa.<s%>

On <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1887>morrow,<s%> as <S%G1565>they<s%> went on their <S%G3596>journey,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> drew <S%G1448>nigh<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1430>housetop<s%> to <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> hour: <S%G5610><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%> he that <S%G5399>feareth<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2038>worketh<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1184>accepted<s%> with <S%G846>him.<s%>
